Loved the food here, it was so fresh and delicious! Had the salmon which was cooked to PERFECTION. Also had a cocktail which was great as well. Will be back! Many times!
The best Vietnamese restaurant in Lund! The food here is spicy, tasty and healthy too. I warmly recommend their Ph·ªü. Service is friendly. Localities are nice. Enjoy!

column7: High class, slightly on the expensive side
column9:
Lunch for 115 SEK, also on Saturdays, with a handful of alternatives to choose between.

The sallad (including small spring rolls, see picture) was certainly large enough. A smallish serving of house-wine for 79 SEK was maybe not. But it was not a bad wine,...More

I love this restaurant! The food is amazing and there are lots of options for vegetarians and vegans. Tasty and very fresh! The service was delightful and there is a tranquil ambience. Food presentation puts this restaurant at the very top. A great culinary experience...More

Menu was given to us after several minutes waiting, the order took even longer to be taken. People that came after us got the food earlier.
Nevertheless, despite the waiting...More

Quite traditional Vietnamese food, healthy and tasty in Lund down town.
Spring rolls fried and fresh, scallops, rice noodle soup and a Vietnamese beer, 350SEK/person.
The food was all good and well prepared.
It deserves a visit.
Very nice and original Vietnamese taste and homemade dishes with quality ingredients. We went there for lunch and had the wonton soup and spring roll salad.

The wonton soup was modest in size but completely satisfying because of the richness of flavour. The beef and cold rice noodle salad was a larger portion with generous portions of vegetable and herb garnishes, probably a better choice for the greedy. Very friendly service....More
Got a lunch dish - the Mango salad - and it was extremely delicious. The service was quick and welcoming.

This place opened recently where a very expensive fish restaurant used to be. They are open for lunch and dinner only and have a weekly menu consisting of 4 main dishes, of which one is vegan (tofu-based). Judging by the menu (which is provided only...More

column7: Excellent food and Very Friendly Staff
column9: Several us us came together from around the world to celebrate a birthday.  Coming from different cultural backgrounds we felt this restaurant would meet our tastes.  We were not disappointed.  Due to the large group we ordered our food online before arriving.  Each course came...More

Nice and friendly, quick service and reasonable prices. I had the catfish (?) which was nicely presented, although there could have been a little more of it. Did find the soy sauce a little too salty but otherwise very nice.
Overall a pleasant experience, thanks!

column7: Good quality but very small portion

This was a pleasant surprise! Vietnamese food, very authentic with lots of flavours. Came for lunch, but will definitely be back for dinner!
